title: 60 Questions, Insights and Reminiscences
description: A light hearted look at life through the eyes of a baby boomer: that's one description of '60 Questions, Insights and Reminiscences'.This is a volume of short, mostly philosophical articles; written in a highly readable, entertaining manner.Delving into such topics as 'What is Happiness', 'What is Love', 'What's Bad about Trust?', 'What's Good About Losing?', 'What's Good About Procrastination?', and 'Can You Remember When Dandelions Were Flowers?'.
author: Margaret Lynette Sharp
